mapper.insert: insert into board (festival_name, member_id, board_total_people, board_start_date, board_title, board_content) values(#{festival_name},#{member_id},${board_total_people},#{board_start_date},#{board_title},#{board_content});
mapper.update: update board inner join board_image on board.board_number = board_image.board_number set board.board_start_date = #{board_start_date}, board.board_end_date = #{board_end_date}, board.board_title=#{board_title}, board.board_content=#{board_content}, board_image.board_image_file_path =#{board_image_file_path}, board_image.board_image_file = #{board_image_file} WHERE board.board_number = ${board_number}
mapper.select: select board.board_number, board.member_id, board.festival_name, board.board_start_date, board.board_end_date, board.board_title, board.board_content, festival.festival_startdate, festival.festival_enddate, board_image.board_image_file_path, board_image.board_image_file from board, board_image, festival where board.board_number = #{board_number} and board.festival_name = festival.festival_name and board.board_number = board_image.board_number;

select RESULT.board_number, RESULT.festival_name, RESULT.member_id, RESULT.board_start_date, RESULT.board_title, RESULT.board_content, RESULT.board_view_count, member.member_nickname, member.member_gender, member.member_birthday, member.member_profile_image, board_image.board_image_file, board_image.board_image_file_path from ( select @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 as rnum, board_number, festival_name, member_id, board_start_date, board_title, board_content, board_view_count from board, (SELECT @ROWNUM :=0) A ORDER BY board_number DESC ) RESULT, member, board_image where rnum > (#{pageNumber} -1) * #{amount} and RESULT.member_id = member.member_id and RESULT.board_number = board_image.board_number LIMIT #{amount}
